title: Moxies Font
content:
So I have the font name and I have the font for Mac, but at work we're using PCs and I need the PC version. I don't know if that's the actual name for it but it was named Montreal.

Here's a screenshot of it:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120718212825im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_4238.jpg)

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks!
author: qqusai

comments.content:
[TypeShop Montreal](http://web.archive.org/web/20120718212825/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/ef-typeshop/montreal/) is available for all platforms, and in OTF. Most of their fonts are not original designs, but I never did figure out what the 'original' was for this one.

- Mike Yanega
